scripts.dev: npm run wait-api && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n next,routing -c green,magenta "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3003 --turbopack" "npm run dr:build:watch"
scripts.dev:docker: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n next,routing -c green,magenta "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -H 0.0.0.0 -p 3003 --turbopack" "npm run dr:build:watch"
scripts.dev:open: npm run wait-api && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n next,routing -c green,magenta "(envcli open $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL} || envcli cmd.exe /c start $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL}) && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev -p 3003 --turbopack" "npm run dr:build:watch"
scripts.wait-api: envcli echo $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} && envcli wait-port $:{NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}$:{API_PING_PATH} || wait-port api:8055
scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run wait-api && next build && next-sitemap
scripts.build:docker: npm run generate && next build && next-sitemap
scripts.build:no:check: npm run generate && npm run wait-api && cross-env NO_CHECK=true next build && next-sitemap
scripts.openapi: npm run dr:build && npm run openapi:yaml && npm run openapi:html
